Glinski Award for Excellence in Research, Univ. of Ottawa 2005 Ontario Early Researcher Award (11th Round) Premier's Research Excellence Award (PREA) 2004 Ontario Distinguished Researcher Award Email: boukerch@site.uottawa.ca Tel: (613) 562-5800 Ext. 6712 2008 Editor of Wiley, "Algorithms and Protocols for Wireless Sensor Networks, 2008 Editor of Wiley, "Algorithms and Protocols for Wireless and Mobile Ad Hoc Networks 2005 Editor of CRC/Chapman "Handbook of Algorithms for Wireless Networking and Mobile Computing", focuses on several aspects of mobile computing, particularly algorithmic methods and distributed computing with mobile communications capability.
